isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX TU-FLO 550 AND TU-FLO 750 - REPAIR

svcproc.title: UNLOADER
svcproc.para: A new cylinder head maintenance kit should be used when rebuilding.

note.para: The entire contents of this kit must be used. Failure to do so may result in compressor failure.

svcproc.para: The unloader pistons in the kit are prelubricated with a special lubricant piece number 239379 and need no additional lubrication. Install the springs and unloader pistons in their bores, being careful not to cut the O-rings. Install the unloader cover gasket and unloader cover and secure the cover capscrews. Tighten the capscrews to 175 to 225 in-lbs. (19.771 to 25.420 N•m) in a crossing pattern after first snugging all screws.
